title: ninaikkAda nEramillai
sahitya:
ninaikkAda nEramillai nenjam nekkurugi vizhi nIr perugi unnai


anupallavi

  manak-kadavait-tirandEn mUDavillai unmEl maiyal koNDEn kai kUDavillai murugA


caraNam    panniru kaNNazhagaip-pArttEn uLLam paravashattAl tuLLa uDal vErttEn
unniru padam nADi innisaiyuDan pADi ODi vandEn AyyA vEl murugayyA
